title: Hero: Card
code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
  <gds-card
    variant="primary"
    border-color="primary"
    width="140px"
    height="140px"
  >
    Primary
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="secondary"
    width="140px"
    height="140px"
  >
    Secondary
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="tertiary"
    border-color="tertiary"
    width="140px"
    height="140px"
  >
    Tertiary
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
